Main":"solid","London":"solid","Stockholm":"solid","Sydney":"solid","Zurich":"solid"}","displayView":"analytics_workspace"},"dataSources":{"primary":"search_8"},"title":"weather.Clouds","description":""}},"dataSources":{"search_1":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg("weather.Windspeed") prestats=true WHERE "index"="s4c_metrics" span=24h BY name
| timechart avg("weather.Windspeed") span=24h useother=false BY name WHERE max in top20
| fields - _span*","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$global_time_tok.earliest$","latest":"$global_time_tok.latest$"}}},"search_2":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg("weather.WindDirection") prestats=true WHERE "index"="s4c_metrics" span=24h BY name

| fields - _span*","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$global_time_tok.earliest$","latest":"$global_time_tok.latest$"}}}},"layout":{"type":"absolute","options":{"display":"auto-scale","height":2000},"structure":[{"item":"chart_1","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":0,"w":1200,"h":250}},{"item":"chart_2","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":250,"w":1200,"h":250}},{"item":"chart_3","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":500,"w":1200,"h":250}},{"item":"chart_4","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":750,"w":1200,"h":250}},{"item":"chart_5","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":1000,"w":1200,"h":250}},{"item":"chart_6","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":1250,"w":1200,"h":250}},{"item":"chart_7","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":1500,"w":1200,"h":250}},{"item":"chart_8","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":1750,"w":1200,"h":250}}],"globalInputs":["input_1"]},"title":"metrics_new","description":"","inputs":{"input_1":{"type":"input.timerange","title":"Time Range","options":{"token":"global_time_tok","defaultValue":"-1y,now"}}}}
